mapper.select: SELECT A.CAMPAIGN_NM campaignname ,A.CAMPAIGN_CD campaigncode ,A.CAMPAIGN_SK campaignid ,B.CAMP_TERM_CD camp_term_cd ,B.CAMP_BGN_DT camp_bgn_dt ,TO_CHAR(B.CAMP_BGN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') camp_bgn_dt1 ,TO_CHAR(B.CAMP_BGN_DT,'HH24') camp_bgn_dt2 ,TO_CHAR(B.CAMP_BGN_DT,'MI') camp_bgn_dt3 ,B.CAMP_END_DT camp_end_dt ,TO_CHAR(B.CAMP_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') camp_end_dt1 ,TO_CHAR(B.CAMP_END_DT,'HH24') camp_end_dt2 ,TO_CHAR(B.CAMP_END_DT,'MI') camp_end_dt3 ,B.CAMP_TERM_DAY camp_term_day ,B.AUDIENCE_CD audience_cd ,（SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CM_CODE_DTL WHERE COMM_CODE_ID = 'C004' AND CODE_ID = B.AUDIENCE_CD） audience_nm ,B.MANUAL_TRANS_YN manual_trans_yn ,（SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CM_CODE_DTL WHERE COMM_CODE_ID = 'G003' AND CODE_ID = B.MANUAL_TRANS_YN） manual_trans_nm ,B.OFFER_DIRECT_YN offer_direct_yn ,B.CHANNEL_PRIORITY_YN channel_priority_yn ,B.CAMP_STATUS_CD camp_status_cd ,B.CREATE_ID create_id ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = B.CREATE_ID) create_nm ,TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') create_dt ,B.UPDATE_ID update_id ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = B.UPDATE_ID) update_nm ,TO_CHAR(B.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') update_dt FROM CI_CAMPAIGN A ,CM_CAMPAIGN_DTL B WHERE A.CAMPAIGN_SK = B.CAMPAIGNID(+) AND A.CAMPAIGN_SK = #{CAMPAIGNID}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CM_CAMPAIGN_DTL USING DUAL ON (CAMPAIGNCODE = #{CAMPAIGNCODE}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CAMP_TERM_CD = TRIM(#{CAMP_TERM_CD}) ,CAMP_BGN_DT = CASE WHEN #{CAMP_TERM_CD} = '01' THEN TO_DATE(#{CAMP_BGN_DT1} || LPAD(#{CAMP_BGN_DT2}, 2,'0') || LPAD(#{CAMP_BGN_DT3}, 2,'0') || '00', 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS') ELSE NULL END ,CAMP_END_DT = CASE WHEN #{CAMP_TERM_CD} = '01' THEN TO_DATE(#{CAMP_END_DT1} || LPAD(#{CAMP_END_DT2}, 2,'0') || LPAD(#{CAMP_END_DT3}, 2,'0') || '59', 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS') ELSE NULL END ,CAMP_TERM_DAY = CASE WHEN #{CAMP_TERM_CD} = '02' THEN #{CAMP_TERM_DAY} ELSE NULL END ,AUDIENCE_CD = TRIM(#{AUDIENCE_CD}) ,MANUAL_TRANS_YN = TRIM(#{MANUAL_TRANS_YN}) ,OFFER_DIRECT_YN = TRIM(#{OFFER_DIRECT_YN}) ,CHANNEL_PRIORITY_YN = TRIM(#{CHANNEL_PRIORITY_YN}) ,UPDATE_ID = TRIM(#{UPDATE_ID}) ,UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CAMPAIGNCODE ,CAMPAIGNID ,CAMP_TERM_CD ,CAMP_BGN_DT ,CAMP_END_DT ,CAMP_TERM_DAY ,AUDIENCE_CD ,MANUAL_TRANS_YN ,OFFER_DIRECT_YN ,CHANNEL_PRIORITY_YN ,CAMP_STATUS_CD ,CREATE_ID ,CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( TRIM(#{CAMPAIGNCODE}) ,TRIM(#{CAMPAIGNID}) ,TRIM(#{CAMP_TERM_CD}) ,CASE WHEN #{CAMP_TERM_CD} = '01' THEN TO_DATE(#{CAMP_BGN_DT1} || LPAD(#{CAMP_BGN_DT2}, 2,'0') || LPAD(#{CAMP_BGN_DT3}, 2,'0') || '00', 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS') ELSE NULL END ,CASE WHEN #{CAMP_TERM_CD} = '01' THEN TO_DATE(#{CAMP_END_DT1} || LPAD(#{CAMP_END_DT2}, 2,'0') || LPAD(#{CAMP_END_DT3}, 2,'0') || '59', 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS') ELSE NULL END ,CASE WHEN #{CAMP_TERM_CD} = '02' THEN #{CAMP_TERM_DAY} ELSE NULL END ,TRIM(#{AUDIENCE_CD}) ,TRIM(#{MANUAL_TRANS_YN}) ,TRIM(#{OFFER_DIRECT_YN}) ,TRIM(#{CHANNEL_PRIORITY_YN}) ,'EDIT' ,TRIM(#{CREATE_ID}) ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE CM_CAMPAIGN_CHANNEL SET TOAST_PRIORITY_RNK = CASE WHEN TOAST_PRIORITY_RNK IS NOT NULL THEN #{PRIORITY_RNK} ELSE TOAST_PRIORITY_RNK END ,SMS_PRIORITY_RNK = CASE WHEN SMS_PRIORITY_RNK IS NOT NULL THEN #{PRIORITY_RNK} ELSE SMS_PRIORITY_RNK END ,EMAIL_PRIORITY_RNK = CASE WHEN EMAIL_PRIORITY_RNK IS NOT NULL THEN #{PRIORITY_RNK} ELSE EMAIL_PRIORITY_RNK END ,MOBILE_PRIORITY_RNK = CASE WHEN MOBILE_PRIORITY_RNK IS NOT NULL THEN #{PRIORITY_RNK} ELSE MOBILE_PRIORITY_RNK END WHERE CELLID IN (SELECT CELLID FROM UA_TARGETCELLS WHERE CAMPAIGNID = #{CAMPAIGNID} AND ISCONTROL = 0)
mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,B.DISP_NAME disp_name ,B.OFFER_AMT offer_amt ,B.CREATE_ID create_id ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = B.CREATE_ID) create_nm ,B.CREATE_DT create_dt ,B.UPDATE_ID update_id ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = B.UPDATE_ID) update_nm ,B.UPDATE_DT update_dt FROM ( SELECT A.CAMPAIGNID campaignid ,A.NAME campaignname ,A.CAMPAIGNCODE campaigncode ,H.AUDIENCE_CD audience_cd ,H.MANUAL_TRANS_YN manual_trans_yn ,H.OFFER_DIRECT_YN offer_direct_yn ,H.CHANNEL_PRIORITY_YN channel_priority_yn ,H.CAMP_STATUS_CD camp_status_cd ,B.FLOWCHARTID flowchartid ,B.NAME flowchartname ,COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY B.FLOWCHARTID) flowchartrow ,B.FILENAME filename ,B.STATUS status ,C.CELLID cellid ,COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY B.FLOWCHARTID, C.CELLID) cellrow ,C.CELLNAME cellname ,C.CELLCODE cellcode ,C.OFFERLISTID offerlistid ,E.OFFERID offerid ,F.NAME offername ,F.OFFERCODE1 offercode1 ,G.OFFER_TYPE_CD offer_type_cd ,G.OFFER_SYS_CD offer_sys_cd FROM UA_CAMPAIGN A ,UA_FLOWCHART B ,UA_TARGETCELLS C ,UA_OFFERLIST D ,UA_OFFERLISTMEMBER E ,UA_OFFER F ,( SELECT OFFERID ,MAX(OFFER_SYS_CD) OFFER_SYS_CD ,MAX(OFFER_TYPE_CD) OFFER_TYPE_CD FROM( SELECT OFFERID ,CASE WHEN ATTRIBUTEID = (SELECT ATTRIBUTEID FROM UA_ATTRIBUTEDEF WHERE NAME IN ('OFFER_SYS_CD')) THEN STRINGVALUE ELSE '' END OFFER_SYS_CD ,CASE WHEN ATTRIBUTEID = (SELECT ATTRIBUTEID FROM UA_ATTRIBUTEDEF WHERE NAME IN ('OFFER_TYPE_CD')) THEN STRINGVALUE ELSE '' END OFFER_TYPE_CD FROM UA_OFFERATTRIBUTE ) GROUP BY OFFERID ) G ,CM_CAMPAIGN_DTL H WHERE A.CAMPAIGNID = #{CAMPAIGNID} AND A.CAMPAIGNID = B.CAMPAIGNID AND B.TEMPFLAG = 0 AND B.FLOWCHARTID = C.FLOWCHARTID AND A.CAMPAIGNID = C.CAMPAIGNID AND C.OFFERLISTID = D.OFFERLISTID AND C.ISCONTROL = 0 AND C.OFFERLISTID = E.OFFERLISTID AND E.OFFERID = F.OFFERID AND F.OFFERID = G.OFFERID AND A.CAMPAIGNID = H.CAMPAIGNID ORDER BY 1, FLOWCHARTID, CELLID, OFFERID ) A ,CM_CAMPAIGN_OFFER B WHERE A.CELLID = B.CELLID(+) AND A.OFFERID = B.OFFERID(+)

mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT) AS ID , TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT) AS NAME, TO_CHAR(0) AS PID FROM CI_CAMPAIGN WHERE INSTR(TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),'\') = 0 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT) UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT) AS ID, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),INSTR(TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),'\')+1) AS NAME, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),1,INSTR(TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),'\')-1) AS PID FROM CI_CAMPAIGN WHERE INSTR(TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),'\')>1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_FOLDER_TXT),TO_CHAR(CAMPAIGN_CD)
